Tool Call.article_content:
# How to Reset Your Password

## Overview
This guide will walk you through the steps to reset your password for your account.

## Prerequisites
- Access to your registered email address
- Valid account username

## Steps
1. Navigate to the login page
2. Click 'Forgot Password' link
3. Enter your username or email
4. Check your email for reset instructions
5. Follow the link in the email
6. Create a new secure password

## Troubleshooting
If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder or contact support.

## Related Articles
- Account Security Best Practices
- Two-Factor Authentication Setup
